pages.text: The Illager Vizier possesses a gem that amplifies spell power. If you coat it with honey, sprinkle it with sugar, and add concentrated emerald, after consuming it you might absorb its power to enhance your spell potency...$(br)Grants the consumer Spell Mastery III (10 minutes), Regeneration II (8 minutes), Nourishment (15 minutes)$(br)Permanently increases potency level by one after consumption, effective up to three times

Eat this candy, not just taste its unique sweetness.$(br)More importantly, with your saliva, your tongue, your taste buds, thoroughly desecrate its former nobility.$(br)Exchange reverence with mundanity, link preciousness with ordinariness.$(br)This magical advancement and deliciousness will then be so crimson and tempting.
